name: Fotor
description: Fotor is an all-in-one online photo editing and graphic design platform that empowers users to create stunning visuals with AI-powered tools and templates.
longDescription: Fotor is a versatile online photo editing and graphic design platform designed for both amateur and professional users to enhance photos, create designs, and craft collages effortlessly. Founded in 2012 by Chengdu Hengtu Technology Co., Ltd., it serves over 350 million users globally with a user-friendly interface and cross-platform accessibility on web, desktop, and mobile devices. The platform integrates advanced AI tools to simplify complex editing tasks, such as background removal and image enhancement, making professional-quality results achievable without extensive expertise. Fotor’s mission is to democratize visual content creation by offering affordable, intuitive tools that inspire creativity and streamline workflows. It caters to freelancers, small businesses, and creative individuals, providing a cost-effective alternative to more complex software like Adobe Photoshop. The platform supports multiple languages and offers cloud storage for seamless project management across devices.
features: Fotor’s AI Photo Enhancer automatically improves image quality with one-click adjustments for brightness, contrast, and clarity, delivering professional results quickly.
The AI Background Remover instantly isolates subjects from backgrounds, enabling users to create clean, customized visuals for various projects.
Fotor’s Graphic Designer provides thousands of customizable templates for social media graphics, posters, and marketing materials, streamlining design creation.
The Collage Maker offers customizable layouts and artistic effects to combine multiple photos into visually appealing compositions with ease.
The AI Image Generator transforms text prompts into high-quality images, allowing users to create unique artwork or illustrations effortlessly.
Cloud storage integration enables users to save and access projects across devices, ensuring flexibility and collaboration.
The platform supports RAW file editing, allowing photographers to work with high-quality images directly from their cameras.
Fotor’s drag-and-drop interface simplifies arranging design elements, making it accessible for beginners to create professional visuals.

faqs.question: Is Fotor free to use?
faqs.answer: Fotor offers a free Basic plan with limited editing tools and templates, while premium features require a Pro or Pro+ subscription.

faqs.question: What platforms does Fotor support?
faqs.answer: Fotor is available on web browsers, Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android, ensuring accessibility across multiple devices.

faqs.question: Can I remove watermarks from my Fotor projects?
faqs.answer: Watermarks can be removed by upgrading to a paid Fotor Pro or Pro+ plan, which also unlocks advanced features.

faqs.question: Does Fotor support AI-powered editing tools?
faqs.answer: Yes, Fotor includes AI tools like background removal, object removal, photo enhancement, and text-to-image generation for efficient editing.

faqs.question: Can I use Fotor for professional graphic design?
faqs.answer: Fotor’s extensive templates, AI tools, and design resources make it suitable for professional-grade social media graphics, marketing materials, and more.

faqs.question: How does Fotor compare to Canva?
faqs.answer: Fotor excels in AI-powered photo editing, while Canva offers stronger collaboration tools and a more generous free plan for design-focused projects.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my Fotor subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes, subscriptions can be canceled through the account settings on Fotor’s website or via the Google Play Store or App Store for mobile purchases.
